patterns: How do I schedule an appointment?
responses: To schedule an appointment, please visit our website or contact our customer service.

patterns: It's a pleasure to meet you
responses: Good morning! How can I assist you today?

Goodbye for now! If you have any more questions, feel free to return.
Until we meet again. Take care and have a wonderful day!

responses: You're very welcome! I'm glad I could assist you.
